title: New: KNESSET – Holocene (Bon Iver Cover)
content:
Another buzz, another Bon Iver cover, this time from LA quartet KNESSET.

Whilst it doesn’t revamp Holocene to the same extent that Avec Sans reinvented Perth, it’s done pleasantly enough, and with a respectable appreciation for the original. Adding a shoegaze touch towards the final minute or two of the track, the vocals verge upon strained at times, yet in a delicately refined manner. Who knew Bon Iver wrote anthems? Check it out below and grab a free download via RCRD LBL.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
